short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal extension which preserves the signature in gmail when following mailto: links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension preserves the signature you have configured in the Gmail web client when following mailto: links in your browser, or if your browser is configured to handle the mailto: protocol.
